snippet.title: Cats & Dice reveal trailer
snippet.description:
Cats & Dice is roguelike dice-building game where the goal is to achieve crazy combos and attain as high a score as you possibly can. Your cats not only generate dice with special effects but also come with unique abilities that can change the course of a run. Master the synergy between cats and dice to win!
(Note: all footage you see here is a work-in-progress and subject to change)

Play the demo and wishlist on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3128280/Cats__Dice/

Join the community and give your feedback on discord:
https://discord.gg/XCVew3K
